short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: 🐦 Get ready to flap your way through a series of obstacles in **Flappy Bird**
short.bg: 🐦 Пригответе се да си проправите път през поредица от препятствия във **Flappy Bird**
short.ca: 🐦 Prepareu-vos per travessar una sèrie d'obstacles a **Flappy Bird**
short.cs: 🐦 Připravte se prorazit si cestu přes řadu překážek ve hře **Flappy Bird**
short.da: 🐦 Gør dig klar til at blafre dig gennem en række forhindringer i **Flappy Bird**
short.de: 🐦 Machen Sie sich bereit, in **Flappy Bird** durch eine Reihe von Hindernissen zu flattern

short.fil: 🐦 Humanda sa paghampas ng iyong paraan sa isang serye ng mga hadlang sa **Flappy Bird**

short.he: 🐦 התכוננו לנפנף בדרככם דרך סדרה של מכשולים ב-**Flappy Bird**
short.hi: 🐦 **फ़्लैपी बर्ड** में बाधाओं की एक श्रृंखला के माध्यम से अपना रास्ता फ़्लैप करने के लिए तैयार हो जाइए
short.hr: 🐦 Pripremite se da se probijete kroz niz prepreka u **Flappy Bird**
short.hu: 🐦 Készülj fel, hogy átverd magad a **Flappy Bird** akadályokon

short.it: 🐦 Preparati a farti strada attraverso una serie di ostacoli in **Flappy Bird**
short.ja: 🐦 **Flappy Bird** で一連の障害物を羽ばたく準備をしましょう
short.ko: 🐦 **플래피 버드**에서 일련의 장애물을 뛰어넘어 나아갈 준비를 하세요.
short.lt: 🐦 Pasiruoškite įveikti daugybę kliūčių žaidime **Flappy Bird**
short.lv: 🐦 Esiet gatavs pārvarēt vairākus šķēršļus spēlē **Flappy Bird**
short.ms: 🐦 Bersedia untuk melepasi beberapa siri halangan dalam **Flappy Bird**
short.nl: 🐦 Maak je klaar om je een weg te banen door een reeks obstakels in **Flappy Bird**
short.no: 🐦 Gjør deg klar til å blaffe deg gjennom en rekke hindringer i **Flappy Bird**
short.pl: 🐦 Przygotuj się na pokonanie szeregu przeszkód w **Flappy Bird**
short.ro: 🐦 Pregătește-te să-ți faci drum printr-o serie de obstacole în **Flappy Bird**
short.ru: 🐦 Приготовьтесь преодолевать препятствия в игре **Flappy Bird**.
short.sk: 🐦 Pripravte sa preraziť si cestu cez sériu prekážok v hre **Flappy Bird**
short.sl: 🐦 Pripravite se na pot skozi vrsto ovir v igri **Flappy Bird**
short.sr: 🐦 Спремите се да прођете кроз низ препрека у игри **Флаппи Бирд**
short.sv: 🐦 Gör dig redo att flaxa dig igenom en rad hinder i **Flappy Bird**
short.th: 🐦 เตรียมตัวกระพือฝ่าอุปสรรคต่างๆ ใน ​​**Flappy Bird**
short.tr: 🐦 **Flappy Bird**'de bir dizi engeli kanat çırparak aşmaya hazır olun
short.uk: 🐦 Будьте готові долати свій шлях через низку перешкод у **Flappy Bird**
short.vi: 🐦 Hãy sẵn sàng vượt qua hàng loạt chướng ngại vật trong **Flappy Bird**

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flappy Bird Official - Chrome Extension 🐦🎮

The Flappy Bird Official Chrome Extension brings the fun and addictive gameplay of the classic mobile game right to your browser! 🎉 With just a click, you can launch Flappy Bird anytime and play instantly—no need for downloads or extra apps. Your goal is simple: tap the spacebar to guide the bird through pipes without hitting them. Sounds easy? Think again! 😅

Why install it?

Quick access: Play Flappy Bird directly in your browser with no loading time.
Instant entertainment: Perfect for short breaks or when you need a fun distraction.
Classic nostalgia: Experience the charm of the original game wherever you go.
Lightweight and fast: No lag, just pure gaming joy!
If you're a fan of challenging, retro-style games, this extension is a must-have! 🎮💻

Play more games on the top-left menu, rate, share, full-screen on the bottom-right.
